About Me

Hi there! Let me tell you a little bit about myself...

BIO

As a software developer and software engineer, my passion lies in the realm of web and mobile development. With a versatile skill set that includes proficiency in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, and more, I am adept at crafting innovative and user-friendly applications. My curiosity and enthusiasm for emerging technologies drive me to stay on top of industry trends, enabling me to deliver cutting-edge solutions. From designing responsive websites to developing feature-rich mobile apps, I strive to create seamless experiences that exceed user expectations. With a strong focus on problem-solving and attention to detail, I am committed to delivering high-quality software solutions that empower businesses and users alike.

Web Development

International Pauper Fund LLC

I coordinated with a team of designers and developers to create a responsive online bank platform. Using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL, we developed a full-stack web application. Taking a hands-on approach, I contributed to the development of the front-end user interface, implemented session timeout functionality to enhance security measures, and ensured the accuracy and completeness of documentation. This experience provided me with a deeper understanding of agile methodologies and their significance in software development, which I gained through practical application and active participation in the development process.

Native Mobile Application Development

Coupanion

I worked collaboratively with a team of developers to design a full-stack native mobile application. Contributing to the design process, I created wireframes and mockups, which were then implemented using JavaScript, React Native, and Firebase. Leveraging Firestore queries, I successfully retrieved and displayed data on a user-friendly home screen. The mobile application I developed enables business owners to list their services, products, and promotions, while allowing consumers to easily discover and interact with them on the platform. Utilizing my progressive learning and experience in mobile development, I focused on creating a seamless user interface and user experience. Additionally, I implemented Google Maps/Apple Maps to display each business's location on their unique page, and configured LocationIQ's Geocoding API to accurately pinpoint the specified business address during signup, ensuring reliable location data.
